responses: Hello! What are the Queries you have?

The event will take place on Hackathon - Oct 17,10:21 AM(BIT Auditorium), Workshop - Oct 23, 10:00 AM(Kumaraguru college of Engineering), Yugam'25 - Oct 10, 10:40 AM(BIT Auditorium), ITRONS - Oct 16, 3:00PM(BIT Auditorium), Lunara - Nov 30, 11:00 AM(BIT Seminar Hall3).

You can register online through our official website. To register for an event login into event hub, load events, all the details will be provided in the respected events.Kindly pay and register for an event.
All participants will receive participation certificates. Top 3 teams will also receive trophies.

patterns: Will accommodation be arranged for participants?
responses: Yes, accommodation is available in the college hostel for outstation participants. Accommodation charges are 500 rupees per day including food. Please contact the helpdesk after registration for hostel booking.
The event is for technical rounds and workshop which include Hackathon, Yugam'25, IEEE Paper Presentation, Lunara and ITRONS.
Each participant must carry their college ID. Formal dress is mandatory for this event. Mobile phones are strictly prohibited during the event.
You can contact the event coordinator at +91-9342034934 or email us at helpdesk@gmail.com for any queries related to the event.
Goodbye! All the best for the event!
